questions.question: What is Pakistan's national sport?
questions.feedback: Field Hockey is Pakistan's national sport, though cricket is more popular among the masses.

questions.question: In which year did Pakistan win its first Cricket World Cup?
questions.feedback: Pakistan won its first Cricket World Cup in 1992 under Imran Khan's captaincy.

questions.question: How many Olympic Gold Medals has Pakistan won in Hockey?
questions.feedback: Pakistan has won 3 Olympic Gold Medals in Hockey (1960, 1968, and 1984).

questions.question: Who is considered the greatest squash player from Pakistan?
questions.feedback: Jahangir Khan is considered the greatest squash player of all time, with 10 British Open titles and an unbroken winning streak of 555 matches.

questions.question: Who was Pakistan's captain when they won the T20 World Cup in 2009?
questions.feedback: Younis Khan led Pakistan to victory in the 2009 T20 World Cup, defeating Sri Lanka in the final at Lord's.
